name: Adways (Japan)
tag_list: advertisement, affiliate, network, japan, china, smartphone, reward, offer-advertisment
overview:
Adways is a digital advertisment company based in Tokyo, Japan. It has the largest mobile affiliate network in Japan. It also offers web affiliate network, smartphone app distribution service.

Adways is also a game developer and its hit title World of Monsters (カイブツクロニクル） has ranked in top 10 grossing chart for over 10months from April 2011. 3 other titles have also ranked in the top 10 chart at various times.

Based in Shang-hai, Adways China offers internet advertisement in China and it has been running a successful business since 2003. Adways has many business alliances outside Japan and proactively extends its services particularly accross Asia.

In 2006, Founder and CEO Haruhisa Okamura was listed in the Tokyo Stocks Exchange as the youngest CEO ever.
